function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of specific research on the non-medical impacts of COVID-19 on the global economy","Impact":"Inability to understand and address the full extent of economic effects, leading to ineffective policy and planning","Mitigation":"Conduct comprehensive research on the economic impact of COVID-19, consider using advanced data analysis techniques like NLP algorithms","Technologies":"Natural Language Processing Algorithm, Latent Dirichlet Allocation (LDA), Non-Negative Matrix Factorization (NMF)","People":"Global policymakers, economists, businesses, and industries","Owner":"Researchers, data scientists, and organizations conducting economic impact studies"},{"Description":"Use of outdated dataset for training the topic modeling model","Impact":"Inaccurate or incomplete representation of COVID-19 impacts due to outdated data","Mitigation":"Use the most current and relevant data for training the topic modeling model, update the dataset periodically","Technologies":"Data collection and curation tools, real-time data sources","People":"Researchers, data scientists, and organizations conducting analysis"},{"Description":"Incomplete coverage of past pandemics in the analysis","Impact":"Failure to learn from historical pandemics and apply insights to the current COVID-19 situation","Mitigation":"Include comprehensive analysis of past pandemics, consider using historical data to inform current pandemic response","Technologies":"Historical data analysis tools, data visualization platforms","People":"Epidemiologists, public health experts, and researchers","Owner":"Research organizations and institutions"}]}
